rules.name: Shield of the Imperium
rules.text: All ranged weapons equipped by +Adeptus Astartes+ models in your army gain +[Heavy]+. If the weapon already had +[Heavy]+, then whenever its bearer Remains Stationary, the weapon also gains +1 to the Wound Roll.

spells.name: Armor of the Machine
spells.effect: Select one friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ +Vehicle+ within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, it has !Feel No Pain 6+!.

spells.name: Defenders of Man
spells.effect: Select one friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ unit within 18". Until the end of the Battle Round, its Toughness trait is improved by 2. If the unit is a +Vehicle+, its Toughness is improved by 3 instead.

strategems.name: Battle Drill
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, ranged weapons equipped by models in the unit gain +[Sustained Hits 1]+. Additionally, if the unit Remains Stationary, unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ score a Critical Hit.

strategems.name: No Threat Too Great
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit may re-roll Wound rolls for attacks made against a +Monster+ or +Vehicle+.

upgrades.name: Student of the Codex
upgrades.text: At the start of the battle, gain 1 CP.

upgrades.name: Shield of the Imperium
upgrades.text: Friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ Units within range of an objective marker gain !Feel No Pain 6+!. If the unit already had !Feel No Pain 6+!, it gains !Feel No Pain 5+! instead.
